TopicSection.Name: BodyText
TopicSection.Content:
Thank you for choosing Spread.Views, the powerful Data Grid widget you can use in web applications that supports HTML5. Spread.Views is a pure javascript based Grid control which allows you to visualize and edit data in WYSIWYG way.

Spread.Views is for web application development that provides you various powerful features such as Grid layout engines, Excel DAX formulas and various Grouping strategies besides normal grid features. More details are available in this product documentation.

  • Developer's Guide
  • Sample Code
  • API Documentation
